lines.speaker: Wife
text: You know, I can tell that you aren't taking our practice seriously. It makes me sad.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: My love, don't be sad! You KNOW how much I care about you!

lines.speaker: Wife
text: Of course I know that! That's not why I'm sad at all!
I'm sad because I can see that you're trapped, right now. My little bird, caught in a cage. But you're the one holding the key.

lines.speaker: Wife
text: Then for once, listen to me when I try to teach you! Will you try?

lines.speaker: Wife
text: No! I want you to try not for me, but for YOURSELF!

lines.speaker: Wife
text: Good. I'm going to teach you a new Overdrive combo now, okay? This one is called Obsidian Break.
It stuns your opponent for a moment, so try using it before they activate a special move.
